official_title: Just Kwit: Mobile Intervention for Tobacco Cessation
inclusion_criteria:
* Age 18-30 smokers interested in cessation (>5 cigarettes/day over the past 30 days)
* Must own an Apple or Android based smartphone.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 30 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Already receiving pharmacological and/or behavioral intervention or counseling for smoking cessation.
